page.title: 16FISHING IN ROXWELL
page.content:
In the Roxwell area there are 4 places to go fishing{NEWLAND HALL} where there are two lakes. In the lakes are trout and carp. There are about 1500 carp and about 1000 trout. The trout lake holds about 7,000,000 gallons and the carp lake holds about 2,000,000 gallons.
There is a lake at{SKREENS PARK} that holds about 3000 fish. About 100 people during the year go there fishing. They buy day tickets. The fish are pike, roach, dace, perch, tench, carp, chub and eel. There is a pond at{TYE HALL FARM. Not many people go there. In the pond are tench, roach and stickleback. The pond has 4 geese but is not very big. Lastly there is{ROXWELL BROOK} which has roach, dace, perch, chub, and eels.
